name: 2023 SEKAI Shrine Omikuji
summary:
期間限定で「2023年セカイ神社おみくじ」が登場！
おみくじを引いて今年の運勢を占おう！

「2023年セカイ神社おみくじ」からは各ユニットごとに「大吉」「吉」「中吉」「小吉」「末吉」「凶」「大凶」の運勢が書かれたおみくじが計42種類出現します。
出現するおみくじは各ユニットごとに全て均一な割合になります。
また、おみくじを1回引くごとに「想いのカケラ×10」がおまけとしてついてきます。

おみくじは期間限定のコレクションアイテムとなります。
獲得したおみくじはカスタムプロフィールの素材として使用することができます。
※カスタムプロフィールで設定できるおみくじの個数は引いたおみくじの個数となります。
description:
•Free Crystals will be used first.
•Duplicate Omikuji may be pulled from the SEKAI Shrine Omikuji.
•Omikuji are pulled one at a time based on existing drop rates. The drop rates therefore do not mean that, for example, Omikuji with a drop rate of 1% are guaranteed to appear once every 100 pulls.
•Drop rates can be viewed from the drop rates tab.
The drop rates that are displayed on the drop rates tab are rounded to the fourth decimal place, so the total may not exactly add up to 100%.
•After starting the SEKAI Shrine Omikuji, even if the app should force-quit or be disconnected without displaying the results screen, pulled Omikuji will be saved and viewable from Omikuji in Custom Profile.
•The Limited Time Memorabilia from this 2023 SEKAI Shrine Omikuji may be made available again in the future. Any potential future availability is currently TBD.
•The Omikuji schedule is subject to change without notice.

name: 2024 SEKAI Shrine Omikuji
summary:
2024 SEKAI Shrine Omikuji, available for a limited time only!
Find out your fortune for this year by pulling an Omikuji!

There are 7 types of Omikuji (Great Blessing, Good Blessing, Moderate Blessing, Small Blessing, Future Blessing, Bad Luck, Terrible Luck) for each of the 6 groups, for a total of 42.
All Omikuji across all groups have an even drop rate.
In addition, you will receive Wish Piece x10 for each pull.

Omikuji are Limited Time Memorabilia items.
You can display acquired Omikuji on your Custom Profile.
*You can display as many Omikuji on your Custom Profile as you have pulled so far.
description:
• Free Crystals will be used before Paid Crystals.
• Duplicate Omikuji may be pulled from the SEKAI Shrine Omikuji.
• Omikuji are pulled one at a time based on existing drop rates. The drop rates therefore do not mean that, for example, Omikuji with a drop rate of 1% are guaranteed to appear once every 100 pulls.
• Drop rates can be viewed from the Drop Rates tab.
• The drop rates that are displayed on the Drop Rates tab are rounded to the fifth decimal place, so the total may not exactly add up to 100%.
• After starting the SEKAI Shrine Omikuji, even if the app should force-quit or be disconnected without displaying the results screen, pulled Omikuji will be saved and viewable from Memorabilia in Custom Profile.
• The Limited Time Memorabilia items from the 2024 SEKAI Shrine Omikuji may be made available again in the future. Any potential future availability is currently TBD.
• The schedule is subject to change without notice.
